Welcome to my little corner on the web

I’m Cátia Neto, a multidiciplinary designer with special focus on creating meaningful brands, and craft the brand experience throughtout multiple touchpoints.

What I do

Creative strategy

Help you draw the blueprint that outlines how to meet specific goals and objectives.

Branding

Work with you to define the unique character of your product or service.

Digital experiences

Design seamless and coherent experiences that resonate with your user.

Branding project for a real estate fund that aims to rehabilitate downtown Coimbra.
